definitions: To take by choice into one's family; especially, to take as one's own child through legal means.
To take and use as one's own (e.g., an idea, method, or name).
To choose to take up, follow, or use.
To take on or assume (a particular position, attitude, or course of action).
examples: They decided to adopt a child from overseas.
The company will adopt a new marketing strategy.
She adopted a more positive outlook on life.
Many countries have adopted similar policies.
